text.language: V/e~teouon masj m~mof e~cwtem marefcwtem: je oupe e~te Pip~neuma jw m~mof n~niekk~l/cia~.
He who has an ear to hear let him hear, what the Spirit says to the churches.

language.div: Dia yang memiliki telinga, biarkan dia mendengar, apa yang Roh katakan, kepada Gereja.

text.language: من له أذنان للسمع فليسمع ما يقوله الروح للكنائس

span.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; pointer-events: none;
